title: Ambient Video Game Music - Hellscape 2
description: Brace yourself for the continuation of the chilling journey with this sequel to our acclaimed collection of hell-themed ambience tracks.
longDescription:
Brace yourself for the continuation of the chilling journey with this sequel to our acclaimed collection of hell-themed ambience tracks. This new set of 10 packs ramps up the intensity and fear, providing game developers with a deeper, more horrifying sonic experience that thrusts players into the heart of an inferno more terrifying than ever before.


Each track in this collection enhances the terror of the underworld. They are filled with more amplified, agonizing screams of the condemned souls, each shriek echoing a different story of eternal despair, meticulously designed to instil a sense of dread in players like never before.


Adding to the growing infernal symphony are the louder, more demonic cackles. The mocking laughs of these malevolent entities now take on a wider range of tones, each more bone-chilling than the last, further amplifying the overwhelming sense of menace that permeates this hellish realm.


This sequel introduces a new layer of unease. The air grows heavier, the danger feels closer, and the sense of despair deepens, all intricately woven into the heart-stopping track that ties these packs together. The soundtrack rises and falls with the grim intensity of the environment, its fearful melody perfectly harmonizing with the horrifying sounds of the inferno.


This sequel is a must-have for game developers aiming to create a deeper, more immersive descent into the inferno. The more intense screams, the darker laughter, and the amplified track all combine to pull players into a nightmare world, intensifying the experience until it becomes an unforgettable plunge into the heart of darkness.



This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

Music Preview 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=00nxI0pd1K0

Music Preview 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pPh6ups6f58


--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
technicalDetails:

Do Sound FX loop: (No)

Minutes of audio provided: 30 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)
